abilities.name: Exoskeleton
abilities.text: Any damage done to Kakuna by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Dangerous Evolution
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned. Flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for an Evolution card that evolves from Kakuna and put it onto Kakuna. (This counts as evolving Kakuna.) Shuffle your deck afterward.
